body:
Comment 8: 
The key is, indeed, using 3DES somehow.

I've attached a patch for code.google.com/p/go.crypto that will allow you to decrypt
these keys. However, if I commit it to the tree it means that openpgp links in
crypto/des. Can you provide the output of `gpg --version`. Even my ancient gpg version
doesn't default to 3DES.
_Status changed to **Thinking**._ Attachments: 1. patch (1366 bytes)
